content: 2024 jaina s crochet corner all rights reserved body 5 0mm hook and weight 6 plush yarn green white and brown working with green yarn 1 mc - 8sc 8 2 *single_crochet increase* x4 12 3 *single_crochet increase* x6 18 4 *single_crochet increase single_crochet* x6 24 5 -7 single_crochet around 24 - 3 row 8 8sc attach top of beak with 5sc 11sc 24 9 8sc attach bottom of beak with 5sc 11sc 24 --> insert the eyes in between row 6 and 7 on either side of the beak about 5 stitches apart 10 *single_crochet decrease single_crochet* x6 18 - on the last stitch switch yarn color to white working with white yarn 11 *single_crochet decrease* x6 12 12 *single_crochet increase* x6 18 - on the last stitch switch yarn color to brown stuff the head of the duck 2024 jaina s crochet corner all rights reserved body continued 5 0mm hook and weight 6 plush yarn green white and brown working with brown yarn 13 3inc attach top of wing using 3sc 6sc attach top of second wing using 3sc 3inc 24 14 *increase single_crochet* x3 attach bottom of wing using 3sc 6sc attach bottom of second wing using 3sc *single_crochet increase* x3 30 15 *single_crochet increase single_crochet* x3 12sc *single_crochet increase single_crochet* x3 36 single_crochet until you are centered in the back of the head i did 2sc this will be your new starting point for the rest of the row 16 *increase 3sc* x3 12sc *3sc increase* x3 42 17 5dcinc 41 single_crochet the rest of the round 46 18 5dcdec 41sc 42 note the 5dcinc and 5dcdec create the tail of the duck 19 40sc decrease 41 20 decrease 35sc 2dec 38 21 2dec 34sc 36 22 *single_crochet decrease single_crochet* x2 7sc *single_crochet decrease* x2 7sc *2sc decrease* x2 30 23 *single_crochet decrease* x2 6sc decrease 3sc decrease 5sc *single_crochet decrease* x2 24 24 *single_crochet decrease* x2 *3sc decrease* x3 single_crochet decrease 18 25 *single_crochet decrease* x6 12 stuff the body of the duck 26 *decrease* x6 6 fasten_off and close weave in the end 2024 jaina s crochet corner all rights reserved congratulations you ve completed the biscuit the duck no-sew pattern he s super happy to be part of your home thanks so much for following my pattern please feel free to follow me on instagram and ravelry and be a part of my crochet community instagram @jainas crochet corner facebook & pinterest jaina s crochet corner ravelry jainascrochet etsy jainascrochetcorner1 i look forward to keeping in touch all patterns designs and photographs included in this pattern are the property of jaina s crochet corner this pattern is for personal use
